name: SliperyBoi
description:
SliperyBoi - An Indie Game that seems easy, but is way to hard !!!

SliperyBoi is an Endless game  based on a simple game mechanics, player has tp comtrol a cube a and prevemt it from colliding into Obstacles.

If the cube collides with any Obstacle, or falls of the Platform. Game ends...

Seems Easy Right ???

But it isn't....

Give SliperyBoi a Try !!!!
